projects.description: Create an e-commerce personalization platform that uses machine learning algorithms to recommend products and personalize the shopping experience for each customer.

projects.name: Smart Home Security System
projects.description: Develop a smart home security system that uses machine learning algorithms to detect and prevent potential security breaches and intrusions.
